link:labelLink.link:label: Financial Position 3
Assets Average Balance Of Interest Earning Cash And Liquid Assets Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest earnings cash and liquid assets. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Assets Average Balance Of Interest Earning Investment Securities Physical Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest earning securities. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Assets Average Balance Of Interest Earning Loans And Advances Credit Cards Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest earning loans and advances credit cards. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Assets Average Balance Of Interest Earning Loans And Advances Housing Loans Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest earning loans and advances Housing Loans. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Assets Average Balance Of Interest Earning Loans And Advances Lease Financing Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest earning loans and advances lease financing. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Assets Average Balance Of Interest Earning Loans And Advances Other Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest earning loans and advances other. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Assets Average Balance Of Interest Earning Loans And Advances Overdrafts Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest earning loans and advances overdrafts. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Assets Average Balance Of Interest Earning Loans And Advances Term Loans Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest earning loans and advances term loans. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Assets Average Balance Of Interest Earning Total Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of all interest earning assets excluding Intragroup. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Assets Average Balance Of Interest Earning Trading Securities Total Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest earning trading securities total. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Assets Insurance Excess Of Net Market Values In Subsidiaries Over Recognised Net Assets Of Subsidiary Amount
This is the value, as at the relevant date, for the net market excess of the investment in a life insurance subsidiary over the recognised net assets of that subsidiary.
Assets Insurance Investments Relating To Life Insurance Business Amount
This is the value, as at the relevant date, for investments relating to life insurance business.
Liabilities Average Balance Of Interest Bearing Bonds Notes And Long Term Borrowings Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest bearing bonds notes and long term borrowings. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Liabilities Average Balance Of Interest Bearing Deposits Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest bearing deposits. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Liabilities Average Balance Of Interest Bearing Loan Capital Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest bearing loan capital over the reporting period. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Liabilities Average Balance Of Interest Bearing Other Borrowings Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of interest bearing other borrowings over the reporting period. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Liabilities Average Balance Of Interest Bearing Total Amount

This is the value, during the relevant period, for the average balance of total interest bearing liabilities excluding Intragroup over the reporting period. The average may be calculated by any method consistent with internal systems of the reporting entity.
Liabilities Insurance General Insurance Outstanding Claims And Unearned Premium Amount
This is the value, as at the relevant date, for the general insurance outstanding claims and unearned premium.
Liabilities Insurance Life Insurance Policy Liabilities Amount
This is the value, as at the relevant date, for the life insurance policy liabilities.
